question_text: Which of the following power delivery issues can result from using an older PSU in a modern build? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of 8-pin EPS connector for CPU
Excessive wattage rating for the build
correct_answer: Lack of 8-pin EPS connector for CPU
explanation: Older PSUs may not have modern connectors or enough 12V amperage. Excessive wattage rating is not an issue unless efficiency is a concern.
